Divine Weapon: Add 6 enhancements to weapon for 20 min 4/dy
Elemental Channel (Air): Channel Energy to heal or harm Air outsiders
Shining Light: 30' radius inflicts 10d6 HP and blindness 1 rd on evil creatures (1d4 rd blindness on dragon, outsider, or undead) (DC 23 Ref half HP only); good creatures regain 10d6 HP and gain +2 ability checks, attack, saves, and skill checks for 1 rd 3/dy
Smite Evil: +3 attack, +20 HP damage, bypass DR, and +3 AC vs. evil foe (dbl HP vs. outsider, dragon, or undead) 7/dy
Step Up: Match foe 5' step

Aura Of Resolve: Immune charm, R10' +4 to allies

Magic
Magic Notes:
Charisma Channel Energy Adjustment: +3
Power Of Faith: +5 daily uses of Lay On Hands
Aura: Visible to Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law based on deity alignment
Channel Energy: R30' Heal or inflict 10d6 HP (DC 23 Will half) 6/dy
Channel Positive Energy: May expend 2 Lay On Hands uses for Channel Energy
Detect Evil: R60' Detect Evil at will
Holy Champion: Maximize lay on hands, Smite Evil DC 20 Banishment
Lay On Hands: Harm undead or heal 10d6 HP 14/dy
Light Of Faith: May use Lay On Hands for 60' radius that acts as Daylight spell and gives allies +2 AC, attack, damage, and saves vs. fear, 20 resistance to chosen energy, 50% chance of negating critical hit damage, and healing of 2d4 ability damage
Mercy: Lay On Hands removes condition(s) blinded, deafened, diseased, paralyzed, poisoned, shaken
Selective Channeling: Avoid up to 3 targets
